frame.name: Creator Score Mini App
frame.subtitle: Create Onchain. Earn Rewards.
frame.description: Track your creator reputation across onchain platforms like Zora, Farcaster, Mirror or Lens, and start earning rewards in USDC.

frame.installPrompt: Add Creator Score to your Farcaster account to track your onchain reputation and earn rewards
